Description: Worked flint, or waste piece, roughly rectangular in shape, segmented blade, truncated on both short sides, abrupt retouch along both dorsal laterals, remains of a dull reddish cortex on dorsal surface. Greyish-brown coloured stone, coarse-grained.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, surface (X)
